verses.verse: My <WG3450> brethren <WG80>, have <WG2192> <WG5720> not <WG3361> the faith <WG4102> of our <WG2257> YY <WG2962> Yeshuw`a <WG2424> Moshiach <WG5547>, the YY of glory <WG1391>, with <WG1722> respect of persons <WG4382>.

For <WG1063> if <WG1437> there come <WG1525> <WG5632> unto <WG1519> your <WG5216> assembly <WG4864> a man <WG435> with a gold ring <WG5554>, in <WG1722> goodly <WG2986> apparel <WG2066>, and <WG1161> there come in <WG1525> <WG5632> also <WG2532> a poor man <WG4434> in <WG1722> vile <WG4508> raiment <WG2066>;

And <WG2532> ye have respect <WG1914> <WG5661> to <WG1909> him that weareth <WG5409> <WG5723> the gay <WG2986> clothing <WG2066>, and <WG2532> say <WG2036> <WG5632> unto him <WG846>, Sit <WG2521> <WG5737> thou <WG4771> here <WG5602> in a good place <WG2573>; and <WG2532> say <WG2036> <WG5632> to the poor <WG4434>, Stand <WG2476> <WG5628> thou <WG4771> there <WG1563>, or <WG2228> sit <WG2521> <WG5737> here <WG5602> under <WG5259> my <WG3450> footstool <WG5286>:
Are ye <WG1252> not <WG3756> then <WG2532> partial <WG1252> <WG5681> in <WG1722> yourselves <WG1438>, and <WG2532> are become <WG1096> <WG5633> judges <WG2923> of evil <WG4190> thoughts <WG1261>?

Hearken <WG191> <WG5657>, my <WG3450> beloved <WG27> brethren <WG80>, Hath <WG1586> not <WG3756> 'Elohim <WG2316> chosen <WG1586> <WG5668> the poor <WG4434> of this <WG5127> world <WG2889> rich <WG4145> in <WG1722> faith <WG4102>, and <WG2532> heirs <WG2818> of the kingdom <WG932> which <WG3739> he hath promised <WG1861> <WG5662> to them that love <WG25> <WG5723> him <WG846>?

But <WG1161> ye <WG5210> have despised <WG818> <WG5656> the poor <WG4434>. Do <WG2616> not <WG3756> rich men <WG4145> oppress <WG2616> <WG5719> you <WG5216>, and <WG2532> draw <WG846> <WG1670> <WG5719> you <WG5209> before <WG1519> the judgment seats <WG2922>?
Do <WG987> not <WG3756> they <WG846> blaspheme <WG987> <WG5719> that worthy <WG2570> name <WG3686> by <WG1909> the which ye <WG5209> are called <WG1941> <WG5685>?

If <WG1487> <WG3305> ye fulfil <WG5055> <WG5719> the royal <WG937> Torah <WG3551> according to <WG2596> the scripture <WG1124>, Thou shalt love <WG25> <WG5692> thy <WG4675> neighbour <WG4139> as <WG5613> thyself <WG4572>, ye do <WG4160> <WG5719> well <WG2573>:

But <WG1161> if <WG1487> ye have respect to persons <WG4380> <WG5719>, ye commit <WG2038> <WG5736> sin <WG266>, and are convinced <WG1651> <WG5746> of <WG5259> the Torah <WG3551> as <WG5613> transgressors <WG3848>.

For <WG1063> whosoever <WG3748> shall keep <WG5083> <WG5692> the whole <WG3650> Torah <WG3551>, and yet <WG1161> offend <WG4417> <WG5692> in <WG1722> one <WG1520> point, he is <WG1096> <WG5754> guilty <WG1777> of all <WG3956>.

For <WG1063> he that said <WG2036> <WG5631>, Do <WG3431> not <WG3361> commit adultery <WG3431> <WG5661>, said <WG2036> <WG5627> also <WG2532>, Do <WG5407> not <WG3361> kill <WG5407> <WG5661>. Now <WG1161> if <WG1487> thou commit <WG3431> no <WG3756> adultery <WG3431> <WG5692>, yet if <WG1161> thou kill <WG5407> <WG5692>, thou art become <WG1096> <WG5754> a transgressor <WG3848> of the Torah <WG3551>.

So <WG3779> speak ye <WG2980> <WG5720>, and <WG2532> so <WG3779> do <WG4160> <WG5720>, as <WG5613> they that shall be <WG3195> <WG5723> judged <WG2919> <WG5745> by <WG1223> the Torah <WG3551> of liberty <WG1657>.

For <WG1063> he shall have judgment <WG2920> without mercy <WG448>, that hath shewed <WG4160> <WG5660> no <WG3361> mercy <WG1656>; and <WG2532> mercy <WG1656> rejoiceth against <WG2620> <WG5736> judgment <WG2920>.

What <WG5101> doth it profit <WG3786>, my <WG3450> brethren <WG80>, though <WG1437> a man <WG5100> say <WG3004> <WG5725> he hath <WG2192> <WG5721> faith <WG4102>, and <WG1161> have <WG2192> <WG5725> not <WG3361> works <WG2041>? can <WG1410> <WG5736> <WG3361> faith <WG4102> save <WG4982> <WG5658> him <WG846>?
If <WG1437> <WG1161> a brother <WG80> or <WG2228> sister <WG79> be <WG5225> <WG5725> naked <WG1131>, and <WG2532> destitute <WG3007> <WG5746> <WG5600> <WG5753> of daily <WG2184> food <WG5160>,

And <WG1161> one <WG5100> of <WG1537> you <WG5216> say <WG2036> <WG5632> unto them <WG846>, Depart <WG5217> <WG5720> in <WG1722> peace <WG1515>, be ye warmed <WG2328> <WG5728> and <WG2532> filled <WG5526> <WG5744>; notwithstanding <WG1161> ye give <WG1325> <WG5632> them <WG846> not <WG3361> those things which are needful <WG2006> to the body <WG4983>; what <WG5101> doth it profit <WG3786>?
Havahn <WG2532> so <WG3779> faith <WG4102>, if <WG3362> it hath <WG2192> <WG5725> not <WG3362> works <WG2041>, is <WG2076> <WG5748> dead <WG3498>, being alone <WG2596> <WG1438>.

Yea <WG235>, a man <WG5100> may say <WG2046> <WG5692>, Thou <WG4771> hast <WG2192> <WG5719> faith <WG4102>, and I <WG2504> have <WG2192> <WG5719> works <WG2041>: shew <WG1166> <WG5657> me <WG3427> thy <WG4675> faith <WG4102> without <WG1537> thy <WG4675> works <WG2041>, and I <WG2504> will shew <WG1166> <WG5692> thee <WG4671> my <WG3450> faith <WG4102> by <WG1537> my <WG3450> works <WG2041>.

Thou <WG4771> believest <WG4100> <WG5719> that <WG3754> there is <WG2076> <WG5748> one <WG1520> 'Elohim <WG2316>; thou doest <WG4160> <WG5719> well <WG2573>: the devils <WG1140> also <WG2532> believe <WG4100> <WG5719>, and <WG2532> tremble <WG5425> <WG5719>.
But <WG1161> wilt <WG2309> <WG5719> thou know <WG1097> <WG5629>, O <WG5599> vain <WG2756> man <WG444>, that <WG3754> faith <WG4102> without <WG5565> works <WG2041> is <WG2076> <WG5748> dead <WG3498>?

Was <WG1344> not <WG3756> Avraham <WG11> our <WG2257> father <WG3962> justified <WG1344> <WG5681> by <WG1537> works <WG2041>, when he had offered <WG399> <WG5660> Yitz'chak <WG2464> his <WG846> son <WG5207> upon <WG1909> the altar <WG2379>?

Seest thou <WG991> <WG5719> how <WG3754> faith <WG4102> wrought <WG4903> <WG5707> with his <WG846> works <WG2041>, and <WG2532> by <WG1537> works <WG2041> was <WG5048> faith <WG4102> made perfect <WG5048> <WG5681>?

And <WG2532> the scripture <WG1124> was fulfilled <WG4137> <WG5681> which saith <WG3004> <WG5723>, <WG1161> Avraham <WG11> believed <WG4100> <WG5656> 'Elohim <WG2316>, and <WG2532> it was imputed <WG3049> <WG5681> unto him <WG846> for <WG1519> righteousness <WG1343>: and <WG2532> he was called <WG2564> <WG5681> the Friend <WG5384> of 'Elohim <WG2316>.
Ye see <WG3708> <WG5719> then <WG5106> how that <WG3754> by <WG1537> works <WG2041> a man <WG444> is justified <WG1344> <WG5743>, and <WG2532> not <WG3756> by <WG1537> faith <WG4102> only <WG3440>.

Likewise <WG3668> <WG1161> also <WG2532> was <WG1344> not <WG3756> Rachav <WG4460> the harlot <WG4204> justified <WG1344> <WG5681> by <WG1537> works <WG2041>, when she had received <WG5264> <WG5666> the messengers <WG32>, and <WG2532> had sent them out <WG1544> <WG5631> another <WG2087> way <WG3598>?

For <WG1063> as <WG5618> the body <WG4983> without <WG5565> the spirit <WG4151> is <WG2076> <WG5748> dead <WG3498>, so <WG3779> faith <WG4102> without <WG5565> works <WG2041> is <WG2076> <WG5748> dead <WG3498> also <WG2532>.
